About Me
View me on GitHub View me on LinkedIn View me on Twitter

Hi! My name is Lloyd, but I sometimes go by Aegizz. I am a third year Computer Science student at The University of Adelaide with a major in Cybersecuritry. I currently work as a Digital Forensic Analyst and spend my spare time researching and experimenting with various areas of red teaming.

Welcome to my blog!

This is where I plan to put all my CTFs, coding competitions, side projects and interesting experiences.
